amendment.description: To require polluters to pay for cleanup of toxic waste sites, by reinstating the original superfund taxes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 408 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 56. Record Vote Number: 97.

action.text: Amendment SA 408 proposed by Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S4361-4362; text: CR S4361) To require polluters to pay for cleanup of toxic waste sites, by reinstating the original superfund taxes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 408 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 56. Record Vote Number: 97.
